item.title: Kinect and Processing
item.author: mike@bridgecanada.com (Mike Bridge)
item.description: I fell into a discussion with another soccer-dad last weekend as we watched our own children play indoor soccer about teaching kids to code. I talked about my experiences with Raspberry Pi, Scratch and Sonic Pi at the coding club we set up at my son’s school, and I mentioned that after reading Generative Art several years ago I pair-programmed some happy faces with my then-seven-year-old son in Processing:
